name: Minesweeper clone
body:
# Minesweeper
Minesweeper built with Angular

This project is still a work in progress - there are several features I'll be working on adding as I have time!

Currently the game should load and work just fine if you clone down or save the repo and run a simple server in the folder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
